DOC.brief_summary: This Phase I clinical trial include 2 part evaluate safety immune response RotaTeq™ /placebo subject 65 80 year age . In Part I , approximately 60 subject US randomly assign 1 2 treatment group receive 3 dos RotaTeq™ placebo . In Part II , approximately 200 subject internationally randomly assign 1 3 treatment group . Part II start Part I data analysis review approved FDA/CBER , Safety Evaluation Committee ( SEC ) regulatory agency . Duration entire study approximately 4 year . Note : As result business decision Sponsor , study proceed Part II . Therefore , report include result Part I .
